code: import{ADD_TODOITEM,CHECKBOX_CLICK,ITEMID,ADD_TO_CART,REMOVE_ITEM}from'./actionTypes';export var addToDoItem=function addToDoItem(){return{type:ADD_TODOITEM};};export var checkboxClick=function checkboxClick(value){return{type:CHECKBOX_CLICK,payload:value};};export var itemId=function itemId(id){return{type:ITEMID,payload:id};};export var addToCart=function addToCart(item){return{type:ADD_TO_CART,payload:item};};export var removeItem=function removeItem(index){return{type:REMOVE_ITEM,payload:index};};
